text: "Let's Hurt Tonight" is a song by American pop rock band OneRepublic. It was released as the third single from their fourth studio album, Oh My My on December 6, 2016, along with its music video. The song was included in the 2016 film Collateral Beauty. It has since reached the top 100 in Austria and Germany, and the top 50 in Switzerland. ==Track listing== ==Music video== As of June 2018, there are two music videos for the song. One music video, released on December 6, 2016, featuring scenes from Collateral Beauty, has over 89 million views, while another version, released on February 16, 2017, without scenes from the movie, has over 4 million views. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016–17) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Italy (FIMI) | 19 |- ! scope="row"| Slovenia (SloTop50) | 30 |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Italy (FIMI) | 100 |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2016 singles Category:2016 songs Category:OneRepublic songs Category:Songs written by Ryan Tedder Category:Songs written by Brent Kutzle Category:Mosley Music Group singles
title: Let's Hurt Tonight
